title: Load an Outbound Truck
description: A warehouse loader must load all staged pallets for a specific shipment onto the correct truck, in the correct order.

tasks.description: Scan the door number where the truck is parked to get the list of shipments assigned to it.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the manifest for the truck at Dock 4.

tasks.description: Scan the first pallet in the staging lane, and the system confirms it belongs to the correct shipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: System validates the pallet is correct for this load.

tasks.description: Load the pallet onto the truck and repeat the process for all staged pallets.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent loads all pallets for the shipment.

tasks.description: Finalize the loading process, which marks the shipment as 'Shipped' and notifies the carrier.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the load is complete, and the system updates the shipment status.
